name: Madaonaire: the rise of chin chin
name_original: Madaonaire: the rise of chin chin
description:
"Madaonaire: the rise of chin chin" is a game based on Episode 248 of Gintama.

You Have 1 Questions, 4 options. The right answer will lead you towards the victory and the wrong answer will lead you into the hell of life, Round one.

"might add some more characters if it get a good responce"

Releasing for Android Soon

How to download

click on the download button, donate if u like or simply click on "No thanks, just take me to the downloads" after downloading Unzip the Zip file using winrar or 7zip

Click on the Madao icon to PLay
